Wisdom needed for mr4 please help i need in game advice analysis and statistics
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Wisdom needed for mr4 please help i need in game advice analysis and statistics
By Anonymous on Tuesday, November 29, 2011 - 04:52 pm:

is it possible to change probability to 100% chance to obtain certain monsters say jelaydon or any dragons? if not how do i increase saucer stone drop rate? or maybe meet more dragons more often in battle? i need either lisa shock or atleast somebody whos monster breeder skills whom surpass my own in otherwords an elite breeder or a personal guru its kinda important

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, November 30, 2011 - 09:07 am:

Nope, you can't change the percentages. You could get CDs or DVDs to make a Dragon, but that's probably taking the easy way out. Remember that most public libraries have DVD collections they loan out, so you can get a pretty good monster collection from disc for free.
